Name: The CLASSLA-Stanza model for morphosyntactic annotation of standard Slovenian 2.0
Description: The model for morphosyntactic annotation of standard Slovenian was built with the CLASSLA-Stanza tool by training on the SUK training corpus and using the CLARIN.SI-embed.sl word embeddings expanded with the MaCoCu-sl Slovene web corpus.The model produces simultaneously UPOS, FEATS and XPOS (MULTEXT-East) labels. The estimated F1 of the XPOS annotations is ~98.27. The model is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.
